name: Wayman College
baseAirport: Miami Opa-Locka Airport or North Perry Airport
about: Wayman College of Aeronautics, formerly Wayman Aviation Academy, is South Floridaâ€™s largest flight school, dedicated to delivering high-quality flight training and aviation education since 1987. With a strong emphasis on academic excellence and innovation, we offer FAA-approved flight training and associate degrees in Aeronautics, Aviation Management, and Aviation Maintenance Management. Our rigorous curriculum, experienced instructors, and state-of-the-art facilities have produced thousands of skilled aviation professionals from over 80 countries. We partner with major airlines like Spirit and Silver, providing students with career-oriented programs and a pathway to successful aviation careers. Located in Miami, Florida, our students benefit from over 350 flying days a year, accelerating their practical flying experience. Join us to embark on your aviation journey with a proven track record of success and a commitment to excellence.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Flight Instructor - Multi-Engine (MEI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
